name: Mighty Barblade
description:
Serve beers to patrons with your Mighty Barblade! Games keep patrons entertained, if they're not bored with the game. Entertained patrons don't nag you for beers! Play game cards to keep your games refreshed and entertaining patrons! Make patrons wait too long for beers and get REKT!

Not yet included:

  • Barblade
